00025 namespace WU2Txt {
00026     void getCommandLineOptions(int argc , char **argv);
00027     void showUsage();

00029 
00030 int
00031 main( int argc , char **argv ) {
00032 
00033     WU2Txt::getCommandLineOptions(argc,argv);
00034     
00035     ParamDataReader *reader;
00036     HillasParameterization param;
00037 
00038     if (argc-optind < 1) {
00039         WU2Txt::showUsage();
00040         exit(1);
00041     }
00042 
00043     string ntuplefilename;
00044 
00045     try {
00046 
00047         for (int i=0; i<argc-optind; i++) {
00048             
00049             try {
00050                 
00051                 ntuplefilename = argv[optind+i];
00052                 reader = new ParamDataReader( ntuplefilename );
00053                 
00054                 while (1) {
00055                     reader->getNextEventRecord( param );
00056                     cout << param << endl;
00057                 }
00058                         
00059             }
00060             catch (EOFException &e){
00061                 // end of file
00062             }
00063         }
00064     }
00065     catch (AnalysisException &e){
00066         cout << "conversion failed: "<< e.what() << endl;
00067     }
00068     
00069 }
00070

00073 void 
00074 WU2Txt::getCommandLineOptions(int argc , char **argv) {
00075 
00076     char c=0;
00077 
00078     while ( c != -1 && c!= 255) {
00079 
00080         c=getopt( argc, argv, "");
00081 
00082         switch (c) {
00083 
00084         default:
00085             break;
00086         }
00087         
00088     }
00089 
00090 }

00093 
00094     cerr << "USAGE: wu2txt <ntuple> [<ntuple> ...]" << endl
00095          << "output is to standard out by default"<< endl <<endl
00096          << "\t-n output the number of events in the ntuple file" << endl;
00097     
00098 }
